t:
You rarely get to meet your hero.



So when I saw my wife's killer at the prison today,
     I hugged and thanked him.
c:
“His schizophrenia is getting worse. He says that someone came to visit him today.”



#hero #wife #murder #thankyou #prison #visit #convict #hug





You don't know who's in prison. You don't know who came to visit. You don't know what's real. That's exactly me right now.
